thumb.title: 【明兎ぽぷり】おやすみの中おやすみ【UTAUカバー】
thumb.description: Hello, I'm riot3121, and it's a VERY late Easter Egg cover. I actually made a cover and PV's text a month ago, but I've only finished the illustration now... Anyways, I hope you'll like it!!P.S. I know today is Tabi's and tomorrow is Tsurara's anniversary, I am free now!!! I'll try to make an original song with both of themChorus: 夢見音ミレ 囁き 連続音Original by: ぽわぽわP - nm15868149UST by: KUNGOM - https://soundcloud.com/2via/deepvocal-kitane-sno-dvustInstrumental by: 2imimik - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1q0mkhZZ8rE Illustration by: me - https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/130311032YT: https://youtu.be/cVMQel1_XaQ

tags.tag: おやすみの中おやすみ
